price: 8. Kuwa (Xaqa) rumeeyey oo samaha fala, waxay leeyihiin beero barwaaqo ah(Janno).
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتُ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lahum jannātu al-naʿīmi
